title: Colors Mask Moto 360 free

descriptionHTML:
Colors mask facer for moto 360 Free is a modern digital yet a simple watchface for your android wear. It is a blend of digital design with a circulating color dial for second’s presentation. With a contrast of high tone colors and black background this watch face presents an elegant look for your smart watch. It has dynamic Interface with a clean look.

FrillRoid Watch Faces focus in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and took enormous time to choose the watch colors with soothing effect that ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.

Key custom features:-

• Easy readability with hybrid design.
• High contrast theme.
• Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than ever
This watch face is for round/circular smart watches only such as the LG Watch Urbane, LG Watch R and Motorola Moto 360. Visit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com.

How it works?

It’s simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen. Open Settings from Android Wear app to customize the Watch Face. Get this app now and provide us your feedback :)
comments: Looks elegant and stylish. But heavily buggy and freezes all the time. Would've been better if the watch face can be customized from the watch itself. Moreover I never saw any customization page in the wear app that shows ads.

Doesn't load to my watch and even though I bought the Pro version when I change it to green it stays red doesn't matter because can't get it to my watch says Color Mask has stopped wasn't worth the 1.01
Crashes Never can set watch face because it crashes. 360 V2
Meh... Not a single one setting in free app. Also, no time i  ambient mode, only seconds ring...
Classic and modern Love how it looks on my moto 360 2nd.
